columns.name: vpc_endpoint_id
columns.description: The ID of the VPC endpoint.

columns.name: service_name
columns.description: The name of the service to which the endpoint is associated.

columns.name: owner_id
columns.description: The ID of the AWS account that owns the VPC endpoint.

columns.name: vpc_id
columns.description: The ID of the VPC to which the endpoint is associated.

columns.name: state
columns.description: The state of the VPC endpoint.

columns.name: private_dns_enabled
columns.description: Indicates whether the VPC is associated with a private hosted zone.

columns.name: requester_managed
columns.description: Indicates whether the VPC endpoint is being managed by its service.

columns.name: policy
columns.description: The policy document associated with the endpoint, if applicable.

columns.name: policy_std
columns.description: Contains the policy in a canonical form for easier searching.

columns.name: subnet_ids
columns.description: One or more subnets in which the endpoint is located.

columns.name: route_table_ids
columns.description: One or more route tables associated with the endpoint.

columns.name: groups
columns.description: Information about the security groups that are associated with the network interface.

columns.name: network_interface_ids
columns.description: One or more network interfaces for the endpoint.

columns.name: dns_entries
columns.description: The DNS entries for the endpoint.

columns.name: creation_timestamp
columns.description: The date and time that the VPC endpoint was created.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags assigned to the VPC endpoint.
